properties.name: version
properties.description: Overrides the version of the app

properties.name: continueSessionSeconds
properties.description: How long can the app be paused before a new session is created,must be less than or equal to five for Android devices

properties.name: gender
properties.description: Set gender of the userValid values are "m", "M", "f" and "F"

properties.name: logLevel
properties.description: Set error for logValues: VERBOSE, DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR

properties.name: enableEventLogging
properties.description: Should every event show up the app's log, defaults to true

properties.name: enableCrashReporting
properties.description: Should app crashes be recorded in flurry, defaults to false, iOS only

properties.name: enableBackgroundSessions
properties.description: Should the session continue when the app is the background, defaults to false, iOS only

properties.name: reportSessionsOnClose
properties.description: Should data be pushed to flurry when the app closes, defaults to true, iOS only

properties.name: reportSessionsOnPause
properties.description: Should data be pushed to flurry when the app is paused, defaults to true, iOS only
